DOC.brief_summary: Comparison safety efficacy combination amlodipine/Benazepril amlodipine monotherapy patient non-essential hypertension , control amlodipine alone .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Response Patients With Hypertension Amlodipine Amlodipine Plus Benazepril .
DOC.criteria: Outpatients 18 year age old . Male female patient eligible . Female patient must either postmenopausal one year surgically sterile , use effective , contraceptive method barrier method spermicide , intrauterine device . Patients essential hypertension measure validated device Severe hypertension ( DBP > 115 mmHg diastolic and/or SBP > 180 mmHg systolic ) . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
